divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work late one night. It almost looked like a blimp with multi color lights. It was very low and quiet for something that big. It sort of seemed to hover and fly slowly over town. I have never seen anything like it in my life except for that one time. It was in southern Indiana, near a highway. Not far from National Guard.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Vincennes
There were no other sightings in Vincennes on or around June 1st 2008
Summary: it was huge and hovered. It seemed to slowly move/hover over the town near a highway. I was driving home from work late at night. I saw multi color lights. There was no sound and it was very low to the ground for something that big
